Amen
              .

speaker: NURSE
text:
What
              ?

speaker: JULIET
text:
Well
              ,
               
              thou
               
              hast
               
              comforted
               
              me
               
              marvelous
               
              much
              .

speaker: JULIET
text:
Go
               
              in
               
              and
               
              tell
               
              my
               
              lady
               
              I
               
              am
               
              gone
              ,

speaker: JULIET
text:
Having
               
              displeased
               
              my
               
              father
              ,
               
              to
               
              Lawrence’
               
              cell

speaker: JULIET
text:
To
               
              make
               
              confession
               
              and
               
              to
               
              be
               
              absolved
              .

speaker: NURSE
text:
Marry
              ,
               
              I
               
              will
              ;
               
              and
               
              this
               
              is
               
              wisely
               
              done
              .

speaker: JULIET
text:
Ancient
               
              damnation
              ,
               
              O
               
              most
               
              wicked
               
              fiend
              !

speaker: JULIET
text:
Is
               
              it
               
              more
               
              sin
               
              to
               
              wish
               
              me
               
              thus
               
              forsworn

speaker: JULIET
text:
Or
               
              to
               
              dispraise
               
              my
               
              lord
               
              with
               
              that
               
              same
               
              tongue

speaker: JULIET
text:
Which
               
              she
               
              hath
               
              praised
               
              him
               
              with
               
              above
               
              compare

speaker: JULIET
text:
So
               
              many
               
              thousand
               
              times
              ?
               
              Go
              ,
               
              counselor
              .

speaker: JULIET
text:
Thou
               
              and
               
              my
               
              bosom
               
              henceforth
               
              shall
               
              be
               
              twain
              .

speaker: JULIET
text:
I’ll
               
              to
               
              the
               
              Friar
               
              to
               
              know
               
              his
               
              remedy
              .

speaker: JULIET
text:
If
               
              all
               
              else
               
              fail
              ,
               
              myself
               
              have
               
              power
               
              to
               
              die
              .
